1000.name: ErrInstallOSMCode
1000.long_description: Error occurred while installing osm mesh through osmctl

1002.name: ErrMeshConfigCode
1002.long_description: Error getting MeshSpecKey config from in-memory configuration
1002.suggested_remediation: Reconnect the adaptor to the meshkit server

1003.name: ErrRunOsmCtlCmdCode
1003.probable_cause:
Corrupted istioctl binary
Command might be invalid

1004.name: ErrDownloadBinaryCode
1004.long_description: Error occurred while download osm binary from its github release

1005.name: ErrInstallBinaryCode
1005.probable_cause:
Corrupted osm release binary
Invalid installation location

1006.name: ErrSampleAppCode
1006.long_description: Error occurred while trying to install a sample application using manifests
1006.suggested_remediation: Reconnect your adapter to meshery server to refresh the kubeclient

1007.name: ErrCustomOperationCode
1007.long_description: Error occurred while applying custom manifest to the cluster
1007.suggested_remediation: Reupload the kubconfig in the Meshery Server and reconnect the adapter

1008.name: ErrCreatingNSCode
1008.long_description: Error occurred while applying manifest to create a namespace
1008.suggested_remediation: Reupload the kubeconfig in the Meshery Server and reconnect the adapter

1009.name: ErrRunExecutableCode
1009.suggested_remediation: Check if the adaptor is executing a deprecated command

1010.name: ErrSidecarInjectionCode
1010.long_description: Error occurred while injecting sidercar using osm(ctl) `osm namespace add/remove <name>`
1010.suggested_remediation: Check if the adaptor is executing a deprecated command

1011.name: ErrOpInvalidCode
1011.long_description: Istio adapter received an invalid operation from the meshey server
1011.probable_cause:
The operation is not supported by the adapter
Invalid operation name
1011.suggested_remediation: Check if the operation name is valid and supported by the adapter

1012.name: ErrApplyHelmChartCode
1012.short_description: Error occurred while applying Helm Chart

1013.name: ErrNilClientCode
1013.suggested_remediation: Reconnect the adaptor to Meshery server

1017.name: ErrParseOSMCoreComponentCode
1017.short_description: osm core component manifest parsing failing

1018.name: ErrParseOAMComponentCode
1018.long_description: Error occurred while parsing application component in the OAM request made by Meshery server
1018.probable_cause: Could not unmarshall configuration component received via ProcessOAM gRPC call into a valid Component struct
1018.suggested_remediation: Check if Meshery Server is creating valid component for ProcessOAM gRPC call. This error should never happen and can be reported as a bug in Meshery Server. Also check if Meshery Server and adapters are referring to same component struct provided in MeshKit.

1019.name: ErrParseOAMConfigCode
1019.long_description: Error occurred while parsing configuration in the request made by Meshery Server
1019.probable_cause: Could not unmarshall OAM config received via ProcessOAM gRPC call into a valid Config struct
1019.suggested_remediation: Check if Meshery Server is creating valid config for ProcessOAM gRPC call. This error should never happen and can be reported as a bug in Meshery Server. Also, confirm that Meshery Server and Adapters are referring to same config struct provided in MeshKit

1020.name: ErrGetLatestReleaseCode
1020.probable_cause: Latest version could not be found at the specified url

1021.name: ErrLoadNamespaceCode
1021.probable_cause: Trying to access a namespace which is not available
1021.suggested_remediation: Verify presence of namespace. Confirm Meshery ServiceAccount permissions

1025.name: ErrGetManifestNamesCode
1025.short_description: Unable to fetch manifest names from github
